name: Minute 30
description:
Minute 30 is a short thriller/horror game made for the June/July Jackpot Jam in under two weeks.

Music is made by John McKinnon. Check him out at:  https://jmmusic.itch.io

Gameplay is inspired by Scriptwelders Don't Escape 4.

Survive in a post-apocalyptic world infested by robots and prepare for the heatwave.

There is unfortunately a gamebreaking bug where the robots stop moving...

Controls:

WASD-move

E-interact

F-flashlight

C-crouch

TAB-inventory
